snippet.title: Redout: Space Assault Reveal Teaser - E3 2018
snippet.description:
Find Redout: Space Assault on Steam!
https://bit.ly/3e0SDnS

Redout: Space Assault is a prequel to the award-winning futuristic racer Redout. The game builds on the series’ trademark lightning-fast action, high-skill gameplay and impressive visuals while adding new weapons and spaceflight mechanics.
Take control of a Super Orbital Recon Fighter during the 2395 colonization of Mars. Shoot down Rebel drones and fighters, dodge enemy fire, and blast at breakneck speeds through exotic galactic locations. With fully customizable vehicles and weapon upgrades, you’ll have to outsmart, outmaneuver, overpower and outclass your opponents in the most exciting arcade space battle in the cosmos!

FOLLOW 34BIGTHINGS ON SOCIAL MEDIA!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/34bigthings/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/34bigthings 
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/34bigthings-srl/ 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/34bigthings/?hl=it 
34BigThings’ Official Site: http://34bigthings.com/

PLAY REDOUT: SPACE ASSAULT ON APPLE ARCADE: https://apple.co/2scoFJX 


CHECK OUT OUR GAMES ON STEAM!
